main event: A civilian observer reported a sighting of a lighted, life-size flying object resembling an airliner in Marysville, Washington.
interesting points: The object was described as cold and luminous gray,The observer was watching for the SCTC Satellite at the time of the sighting,The sighting lasted for approximately one minute,The object was lost from view due to floral obstruction,No corroborating evidence or photographs were available for the report.
sighted object: lighted flying object, approximately the size of an airliner
witness description: a 31-year-old male and a 47-year-old female from Marysville, Washington
